name: ODYSSEY: Golden Hour
description:
SYNOPSIS/SUMMARY:

You are an intergalactic bounty hunter, sent on a mission to capture a missing prince, dead or alive. When the young ruler is found, mysteries arise… 

CHARACTERS:

Aria [The Companion] 

they/them. your shapeshifter companion.

Ross Vaanderhall [The Lord]

he/him. the man looking for his lost son.

Mollie Vaanderhall [The Lady]

she/her. the queen of the galaxy.

Dylan Vaanderhall [The Prince] 

he/him. the missing ruler.

Pak Singh [The Suspect] 

gender selectable (M/F). an internationally wanted assassin.

Lily Singh [The Accomplice] 

she/they. the assassin's sister and partner in crime.

Saul Crimea [The Librarian] 

he/him. your mysterious criminal informant.

Captain J. W. Quill [The Commander]

he/him. the captain of your ship.

PLAYER CHARACTER:

Choose almost everything about yourself, including gender, height, race, class, and stats.

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING

Not-really-beta'd. Prologue made in roughly 12 weeks for Mr. Barker's Genius Hour project.
